::Shredder::

Shredder turns around, taking out his gun. He raises it, pointing it at 
Mantella's neck. She was not a predacon, he was. But then...

To the pit with it, he had betrayed the predacons many times in the past. It 
was nothing new to him. He shruggs and puts away his gun.

"Doesn't matter to me," he says, walking off toward the stasis pod.
